participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about animal rights, tends to be a bit of a dreamer.
participant_1.background: I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me. I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time! My dogs are my most valued possessions. I live on the third floor in an apartment.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, constantly finding beauty in contradictions.
participant_2.background: My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices. I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself. I am bisexual. My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am. I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.

content.text: I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation. How about you?
I am not sure I would want fame, my family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
My dogs are my most valued possessions.
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.
I live on the third floor in an apartment.
What kind of work do you do?
What kind of art do you create?
I make jewelry, but I also like to paint and draw.
That sounds really cool! What type of jewelry do you make?
I make a lot of different types, but I specialize in making necklaces.
Necklaces are my favorite type of jewelry! I like that you can change them up to match your outfit.
Thanks! I love making them, and I'm glad you like them.
